Class Decorator

java.lang.Object
work3.Decorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConcreteDecoratorBorder, ConcreteDecoratorColor, ConcreteDecoratorShadow
public abstract class Decorator extends Object implements Element
Abstract class Decorator implements the Element interface and serves as a base class for all decorators

This class holds Ð° field of type Element

In the template, this element is Decorator
